headline: Is Wall Street Bullish or Bearish on Allegion Stock?
summary: Allegion has outpaced the broader market over the past year, and Wall Street analysts remain cautiously bullish on the company’s outlook.

raw.headline: Is Wall Street Bullish or Bearish on Allegion Stock?
raw.summary: Allegion has outpaced the broader market over the past year, and Wall Street analysts remain cautiously bullish on the company’s outlook.

headline: How Investors May Respond To Allegion (ALLE) Launching AdaptivIQ Retrofit Kits for Automatic Door Operators
summary: Allegion US recently announced enhancements to its LCN 2800IQ and 9500IQ Senior Swing automatic door operators, introducing the patent-pending AdaptivIQ self-adjusting technology and Smart Power Boost for improved performance in high-traffic environments. This upgrade enables existing customers to retrofit previously installed units using upgrade kits, potentially expanding Allegion's addressable market and adding new value for current users. We'll explore how the introduction of AdaptivIQ...
